content: Janam: - balaheenarum, paapikallumaaya nyangalludemel anugrahangallum karunayum randu lokangallilum ennumennekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: /Tpattakkaaran:- nyangallude kartthaavum daivavume! Ninte maathaavineyum, ellaa parishuddhanmaareyum, shuddhamathikalleyum, ee neram thirusannidhiyil nyangall smarikkunnu. Avarude praarththhanaasahaayangallaal nyangalle kaatthukollllaname. Avarude punyajeevithatthe anukarippaanum, avareppole ninakku ishdanmaaraakuvaanum nyangalle sahaayikkaname. Nyangall ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthiyum sthothravum samarppikkum. Hosho ... Aammeen.

content:
Yaachikkunnu
Nyangallodoppam nyangallkkaayu praarththhikkuka nee
Nrpapathi savidham
Shamavum shaantiyum ulakengum vaazhattathinaal
Sadayam nee- kkeedatte
Sakala nivaa-sangallil ni-
Nnarishatthin dandam.
Janam: - kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran:- (men aaloho nkaabel) daivatthil ninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum, paapangallkku mochanavum, randu lokangallilum ennekkum naam kaikkollllumaaraakatte. Aammeen.

Naathhane vaazhtthuvinutthamare
Parimalladhoopayutham-daivatthin janani
Kanyakamariyaami-nnormma bhavikkatte.

Mariyaamin smaranam-varadaayaka maaka
Thalpraarththhana nyangall-kkaathmaavinu kotta.

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum-bhaagyam shleeharkkum
Bhaagyam sahaderkkum-punaruththhaana dine.

Mashihaaye kaanmaan-kaamkshichoru sahader
Vaallaal chirakukall poo-ndunnathapadameri.

Balaheenatha neekki - thuna cheyyuka naathhaa!
Raapakaladiyangall-kkaashrayamangallo.

Vaanilu moozhi yiledanilum-haaleluyyaa
Dayaraa devaagaarangalli-lellaadatthum
Kanyakamariyaaminnundaakatte nallormma.
Nirmmalamaam kanyaathvatthil -thiruvullamaarnnu
Raajaadheeshanirangivasichavall thannudaratthil
/tbhuvisvarge - thalsmrthi vallaratte
/tkottayathaayu praarththhana theeratte;
Naathhaa! Cherkkuka nyangalle nin maathr-smaranatthil

Vaazh/u200bverum nirmmalakanyaka thannudaratthil
Hithamodudayam cheythoru daivasuthaa! Sthothram the.
Karnnatthaalavane kaiykko-ndudare peri.
Garbhaashaya kanyaamudrakalleennum nirgathanaay
/tjaathikalle-lajaakularaakki
/tsthuthiyadhikam-thaazhchama varichone!
Naranaayu raksha kodutthavane! Sabha keertthikkunnu.

Praarththhippin shleehanmaare! Kartthaavodaay
Bhinnatha sabha than santaanangallili-llaathaavaan.
Ningallathil cholliyathaakum-vishvaasatthe
Maayichiduvaan-dusthaarkkikarathine chuttunnu.
/tsathyamathaam-mooshayilaavachanam
/tkanakam pol-shodhicheedatte.
Vaidikar vaazhtthum, shuddhasabhaykkudayam chertthone.

Krooshinmel thalachaayichon -valabhaagatthaay
Mudi mudayunnathu kandappoll sahadenmaar  ningall
Naanaavidha yaathanayeyum-koosidaathe
Gallarudhiratthaal dhavallima amgangall-kkullavaakki
/tpeedakalle venniha mashihaaye
/tsnehichor -dhanyanmaar ningall
Bhoosvargangallilerunnu smaranam- ningallkkaay.

Aahvaanam cheyyunnuthavi-kketthuka naathhaa!
Kalahippikkunnulakatthe dushdan-vanchanayaal
Bhinnatha nrpa vidhikartthaakkalli-lavanullavaakki
Dhaarmmikareyum veezhippaan vazhi no-kkeedunnu.
/tkartthaave! Nin karunayilenye
/tsangketham-nyangallkkengulllloo?
Dushdane nyangallil ninnodikkuka nin-+sleebaayaal.

Nyaayaadhipanyaayaadhipathe angekkarisham
Cherttha kadatthaalen thala thaazhttharuthe-vidhigehe
Mochanayogyathayillengkilu-mennilirikkum
Nintirumeyyum rakthavumortthenmel krpacheyka.
/tninsnehaal-sleebaa+ nyaan kooppi;
/tpizhapokki-nin meyu rudhirangall.
Hithamodu karunaamayaneesho, mama -nalkuka mukthi.

Khedam vendaa mashihaayil mrthi poondore!
Aasannam prathiphalamekum punaruththhaanadinam.
Kedenye kabarukalleennum ningallezhunne
Ttathivegam raajaathmajane ethirelppaanetthum.
/tmahimaavin neeraallam chaartthi
/tthirumumpil sthuthipaadum ningall
Kanivaalaadaam sutha jeevapradane -krpa cheyka.

Makkallilappan krpa cheythathu pole-haa-haa
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
/tpullinu thulyam naranude naallkallaho-haa-haa
/tpookkunnithu vayalil poochedi pole.

Sharanatthaale nin krpayil
Maranamadanyoru daasare nin
Jeevasvaramathunartthaname
Kabareennudyaanatthinnaay

Naathhaa thaavaka mirulokam;
Ninnadhikaaram thaanengum
Sleebaayaal+ jeevithare kaa-
Tthanpaal mukthi mrtharkkeka.

Sthothram! Mrthajeevapradane!
Kabareennetteedunnone,
Nin prekshakathaathanum mamalan
Roohaaykkum haaleluyyaa.

Maathrvishuddha smrthi sambandham nalkuka naathhaa!
Thal praarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum.

Daaveeduputhri! Bhoopaalare neekkum bhoopangkal
Svaathantryam the kaanmathinaale yaachikkunnu.

Kallara-vaasam cheyyum-mrthare-neduka dhairyam
Thal sa-ndesham-kellppin-savidham punaruththhaanam

Bhaagyavathikkum siddharkkum mrtharaam bhaktharkkum
Smrthi uyaratthilumee sabhayilumundaayeedatte.

Shuddhan nee aaloho
Shuddhan nee balavaane
Krooshettone! Mrthiheenaa parishuddhan nee krpa cheytheedaname.
(moonnu praavashyam)

Naathhaa! Krpa cheytheedaname.
Naathhaa! Kanivaal krpa cheyka
Naathhaa! Karmmavumarththhanakallu-mettittavayaal krpa cheytheedaname.

Sthothram the deveshaa!
Sthothram the srashdaave
Sthothram paapikalladiyaaril-krpa cheytheedum mashihaaraajaave!
